data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 21670, Version Hash: 037b2241b6461eef8ed888932ed949ab46cf67a0
data.short_description: Reactions or new embeds cause Discord stable to crash on Firefox
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord in Firefox (stable or canary) - React to a message - OR post an embed that has never been posted anywhere on Discord before
